citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
An environmental enhancement plan for birds has not been written. This plan is necessary to promote the psychological
well-being of birds. The licensee must develop, document, and follow a species-appropriate plan that has been approved
by the Attending Veterinarian. The plan must be in accordance with AWA regulations and with currently accepted
professional standards as cited in appropriate professional journals or reference guides.
TO BE CORRECTED BY OCTOBER 13, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n
